# headerColor

**Type Property**

The system color used as the background color for header cells in table views and outline views.

## Declaration

```swift
class var headerColor: NSColor { get }
```

## Return Value

The system color used as the background for header cells in table and outline views.  For general information about system colors, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/DrawColor/Tasks/SystemColors.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20000790].

## Deprecated colors

- **alternateSelectedControlColor**: The system color used for the face of a selected control in a list or table.
- **controlAlternatingRowBackgroundColors**: An array containing the system specified background colors for alternating rows in tables and lists.
- **controlHighlightColor**: The system color used for the highlighted bezels of controls.
- **controlLightHighlightColor**: The system color used for light highlights in controls.
- **controlShadowColor**: The system color used for the shadows dropped from controls.
- **controlDarkShadowColor**: The system color used for the dark edge of the shadow dropped from controls.
- **knobColor**: The system color used for the flat surface of a slider knob that hasn’t been selected.
- **selectedKnobColor**: The system color used for the slider knob when it is selected.
- **scrollBarColor**: The system color used for scroll “bars”—that is, for the groove in which a scroller’s knob moves
- **secondarySelectedControlColor**: The color used for selected controls in non-key views.
- **selectedMenuItemColor**: The color to use for the face of selected menu items.
- **windowFrameColor**: The system color used for window frames, except for their text.
